div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://github.com/phenopackets/core-ig/CodeSystem/hpo where concept is-a HP:0003674
Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 282032007 (Periods of life)

publisher.value: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health - Clinical and Phenotypic Data Capture Work Stream

name.value: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health - Clinical and Phenotypic Data Capture Work Stream

description.value: Set of HPO codes that denote the onset of a disease or phenotypic feature. The codes are descendants of Onset (HP:0003674) or from SNOMED_CT (282032007).
